extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays the status of Faronics Power Save. Values returned include "Enabled" and "Disabled". This attribute has been tested with Power Save 2.0.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh psUsername="EditFromTemplate_Power_Save_Service_Account_Username" psPassword="EditFromTemplate_Power_Save_Service_Account_Password" if [ -f "/Library/Application Support/Faronics/PowerSave/CLI" ]; then psStatus=`"/Library/Application Support/Faronics/PowerSave/CLI" "$psUsername" "$psPassword" status | grep "Application Enabled" | awk '{print $3}'` if [ "$psStatus" == "false" ]; then result="Disabled" else result="Enabled" fi fi echo "<result>$result</result>"
